alert.note: Alert for Leflore; Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 13 at 11:58PM CST until December 14 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN SUNFLOWER AND CENTRAL LEFLORE COUNTIES... At 1158 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Minter City, or 16 miles south of Charleston, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Sunflower and central Leflore Counties, including the following locations... Schlater. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for north central and northwestern Mississippi. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 600 AM CST for north central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
